revised_title: A New Method for Comparing Gas Densities
tldr: The author presents a static method for comparing the densities of gases using a micro-manometer. The method measures small differences in pressure accurately and can detect differences in gas densities down to 1/5000 parts. The author demonstrates the method's effectiveness by comparing the densities of producer gas and air, finding a density of 0.001102 grams per cubic centimeter for the producer gas.
